question:

C. Sam tidak menghadiri kelas matematika kemarin​

related_questions.question:
Simple present Tense (Verbal)    1. She _____ her dog everyday 
A.Feed
B.Feeds
C.To feed
D.Feeding

2. I ____ always go to the dentist 
A.are not
B.do not
C.does not
D.did not

3. When do you ____ a shower? 
A.taking
B.take
C.taken
D.took

4. Q: Do you like to sing? A: … 
A.Yes, I likes to sing
B.Yes, I like to sing
C.Yes, I am liking to sing
D.Yes, I liked to sing

5. Tom and I ____ ____ together. 
A.do surfs
B.do surfing
C.don’t surfing
D.don't surf

6. I ___ breakfast every day at 7 AM 
A.to eat
B.eat
C.eaten
D.ate

7. Q: How do you go to school? A: We ___ the bus to school 
A.riding
B.ridden
C.ride
D.rode

8. Q: When do you do your homework? A: … 
A.I did my homework at 6 PM
B.I am doing my homework at 6 PM
C.I do my homework at 6 PM
D.I have did my homework at 6 PM

9. Q: Do you enjoy playing in the park? A: … 
A.No, I don’t enjoys playing in the park
B.No, I doesn’t enjoy playing in the park
C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park
D.No, I no enjoy playing in the park

10. Q: Does he love his mother? A: … 
A.He love his mother
B.He to love his mother
C.He is loving his mother
D.He loves his mother​

answers.answer:
1. feeds

2. do not

3.take

4. yes, i like to sing

5. do surfing

6. i eat

7.ride

8.C.I do my homework at 6 PM

9.C.No, I don’t enjoy playing in the park

10.D.He loves his mother

Penjelasan:

simple present tense.

yang artinya masa sekarang. dalam tenses ini menggunakan verb satu dan jika subjek she he it nama orang maka verb bertambahan s

related_questions.question: Isilah bagian yang kosong dengan bentuk lampau (VERB/TO BE) 1. dia....(adalah) cantik​

Bantuin gua dong plisss, yang ngerti dan pinter Bahasa Inggris nya    How Day and Night Happen

In this world, as we already know when the sunlight shines, we all call it a day. and when there's no sunlight, we all call it a night. but how it happens?

day happens when the sun is above us or there's a sunlight. but it's not all part of the Earth that is being hitten by the sunlight. and the part of earth that isn't being hitten by the sun, we call it a night. actually, it's not the sun that's spinning around the earth as we usually see. but, it is the earth that spins around the sun.

so, part of earth that's facing the sun, there's a day. meanwhile, the part of earth that's not facing the sun, there's a night.

1. Identify the generic structure of the text
2. Write the sentence using 
a. Present simple
b. Conjunction
c. Passive​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Bagaimana Siang dan Malam Terjadi

Di dunia ini, seperti yang sudah kita ketahui kapan sinar matahari bersinar, kita semua menyebutnya sehari. dan ketika tidak ada sinar matahari, kita semua menyebutnya malam. tapi bagaimana itu terjadi?

hari terjadi ketika matahari berada di atas kita atau ada sinar matahari. tapi tidak semua bagian bumi yang terkena sinar matahari. dan bagian bumi yang tidak terkena matahari, kita sebut malam. sebenarnya bukan matahari yang berputar mengelilingi bumi seperti yang biasa kita lihat. tapi, itu adalah bumi yang berputar mengelilingi matahari.

jadi, bagian bumi yang menghadap matahari, ada hari. sedangkan bagian bumi yang tidak menghadap matahari adalah malam.

so, part of earth that's facing the sun, there's a day. meanwhile, the part of earth that's not facing the sun, there's a night.

jadi, bagian bumi yang menghadap matahari, ada hari. sedangkan bagian bumi yang tidak menghadap matahari adalah malam.

related_questions.question:
Simple Present Formula    (+) Subject + to be (am, is, are) + verbl+o/e
- Subject + to be (am, is, are) + pot+verbl+ole
(?) To be (am, is, are) + subject tverbl+o/c
Complete the sentences below with (+), (-) and (?) by looking at the formula above
6. (-) Linda is not a teacher
(Score 15)​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

(+) Linda is a teacher

(?) is Linda a teacher?
